segments.text: Lisa , I ’ Ve been thinking of something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . I ’ Ve done a lot of business for my company . And now I feel like going into business for myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mean you want to sell up your company of your own ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There ’ s a possibility . What do you say ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s not a bad idea . Bet after all you should get some sound financial guarantee .
segments.speaker: S2
